items.body: This How-to Guide will provide the learner with tips and advice on how to interact with the components. They will select the forward arrow to move through the guide if it is viewed on desktop, or swipe if viewed on mobile or tablet. They can access the guide by selecting the cog icon in the left of the menu bar and selecting ‘Help/Guide’.
items.title: Welcome

items.body: These non-interactive components provide further information.
items.title: Text and graphic

items.body: Select the headings in the stacked list to reveal more information.
items.title: Accordion

items.body:
If viewed on desktop, select the forward arrows to move through the stages of the narrative.
If mobile, you’ll need to swipe the images and select the plus icons to reveal the text.
If tablet, swipe the images to move through the stages of the narrative.
items.title: Narrative

items.body: Select the interactive parts of the image to reveal the accompanying text.
items.title: Hot graphic

items.body: Select the play button to view the video.
items.title: Media

items.body: Drag the reveal bar from left to right across the image.
items.title: Reveal

items.body: Drag the slider from left to right across the rating bar to set your confidence level at the start of the course. You will be asked to set it again after you have completed the learning.
items.title: Confidence slider

items.body: Read the question, choose the appropriate option(s) and select Submit to make your decision.
items.title: Multiple choice question

items.body: Drag the pins to the appropriate areas on the image and select Submit. You will have the option to view a Model Answer if you don’t get it right first time.
items.title: Pin point question

items.body: This pop-up provides feedback to the answer you’ve given. Just select the X icon to return to the learning page from here.
items.title: Feedback

items.body: Select the X icon to return to the learning page.
items.title: Ready?

pages.title: Presentation Components
pages.body: Find out about the two presentation components.

components.title: Text
components.body:
Text components can be single span or full span. Single span text will scale to fit the space and depth available. Full span text will appear as a full width component when viewed on desktop, but will scale down to a single width component on mobile.

components.title: Graphic
components.body: This is optional body text.

components.title: Accordion
components.body: This is optional body text. Select the headings below to reveal the text.

items.title: Heading 1
items.body: This is display text 1.

items.title: Heading 2
items.body: This is display text 2.

items.title: Heading 3
items.body: This is display text 3.

components.title: Narrative
components.body: This is optional body text. Select the forward arrows to move through the narrative on a desktop, or swipe the images and select the plus icons to do so on mobile.

items.title: Narrative stage 1 title
items.body: This is display text 1. If viewing on desktop or tablet, this text will appear to the right of the image. On mobile, you’ll need to select the plus icon to reveal this text.

items.title: Narrative stage 2 title
items.body: This is display text 2.

items.title: Narrative stage 3 title
items.body: This is display text 3.

components.title: Hot graphic
components.body: This is optional body text. Select the hotspots on the image to reveal the text. This component will scale down to a narrative when viewed on mobile.

items.title: Hotspot 1 title
items.body: This is display text 1.

items.title: Hotspot 2 title
items.body: This is display text 2.

items.title: Hotspot 3 title
items.body: This is display text 3.

components.title: Media
components.body: This is optional body text. Select the play button to start the video.
components.transcript: trans transcript text goes here.... transcript text goes here transscript text goes here... transcript text.. transcript text.. transcript text.. transcript text.. transcript text.. transcript text.. transcript text..

components.title: Reveal
components.body: This is optional body text. Drag the slider from left to right across the image. A possible use for this component type is to show a before and after case study.

pages.title: Question Components
pages.body: Find out about the question components.

components.title: Multiple choice question
components.body: The question stem will sit here. Choose the appropriate options and select Submit when you’re ready. Try to place the majority of the informative text in the question stem so that you can keep option text to a minimum.

feedback.correct: FINAL and NON FINAL This feedback will appear if you answered the question correctly.
incorrect: FINAL This feedback will appear if you answered the question incorrectly.
NON FINAL This feedback will appear if you answered the question incorrectly.
feedback.partly: FINAL This feedback will appear if you answered part of the question correctly.

components.title: text input
components.body: If A is 1%, what are B, C and D?

feedback.correct: This feedback will appear if you answered the question correctly.
feedback.incorrect: This feedback will appear if you answered the question incorrectly.
feedback.partly: This feedback will appear if you answered part of the question correctly.

feedback.correct: FINAL and NON FINAL This feedback will appear if you answered the question correctly.
incorrect: FINAL This feedback will appear if you answered the question incorrectly.
NON FINAL This feedback will appear if you answered the question incorrectly.
feedback.partly: FINAL This feedback will appear if you answered part of the question correctly.

widget.body: The question stem will sit here. Select the appropriate areas on the image to make your decision. Doing so will place a pin in that area. This pin can be dragged to another area on the image if you wish to change your mind. Select Submit when you’re ready.

components.title: Matching
components.body: Basically what you need to do is matching the questions below with the drop down box option.

feedback.correct: FINAL and NON-FINAL This feedback will appear if you answered the question correctly.
incorrect: FINAL This feedback will appear if you answered the question incorrectly.
NON-FINAL This feedback will appear if you answered the question incorrectly.
feedback.partly: FINAL and NON-FINAL This feedback will appear if you answered part of the question correctly.

components.body: Question goes here

feedback.correct: FINAL and NON FINAL This feedback will appear if you answered the question correctly.
incorrect: FINAL This feedback will appear if you answered the question incorrectly.
NON FINAL This feedback will appear if you answered the question incorrectly.
feedback.partly: FINAL This feedback will appear if you answered part of the question correctly.

components.title: Ordering
components.body: The question stem will sit here. Choose the appropriate options and select Submit when you’re ready. Try to place the majority of the informative text in the question stem so that you can keep option text to a minimum.

components.submitError: Please preview first to view your selected order

feedback.correct: This feedback will appear if you answered the question correctly.
feedback.incorrect: This feedback will appear if you answered the question incorrectly.
feedback.partly: This feedback will appear if you answered part of the question correctly.

components.title: Results
components.quizNotFinishedText: Once you have completed the quiz, your results will appear here.
feedback:
You've scored [SCORE] out of [MAXSCORE].

Top feedback!!

Close the window to exit the quiz.

You've scored [SCORE] out of [MAXSCORE].

2nd highest feedback!!

Close the window to exit the quiz.

You've scored [SCORE] out of [MAXSCORE].

2nd lowest feedback!!

Close the window to exit the quiz.

You've scored [SCORE] out of [MAXSCORE].

Lowest feedback!!

Close the window to exit the quiz.
components.reviewText: You should review the following areas:
components.finalInstruction: Close the window to exit the quiz.
